summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGet inspired with e.l.f. Cosmetics' Perfect 10 Eyeshadow Palette. The 10-color palette is perfect for shading, highlighting, and defining. It features a range of matte and shimmer shades for endless looks. Applies silky smooth and blends with ease, delivering intense color payoff.
details: DetailsBenefits10-shade eyeshadow palette featuring gold, copper, ruby & deep brown shimmers, brown warm tone and deep brown matte shadesUltra-pigmented, blendable colorSmooth, creamy applicationPerfect for shading, highlighting & defining eyes100% vegan, cruelty-free & Leaping Bunny CertifiedFeaturesRose Gold Sunset includes 6 shimmers & 4 mattesGold, copper & ruby tone shimmersBrown warm tone mattesDeep brown shimmer & deep brown matteFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanHydroquinoneItem 2614416How To UseApply a light shade all over eyelids, then swipe on a medium shade into creases and blend with your favorite e.l.f. Cosmetics eye brushesWork the darkest shade along lash lines on the outer corners of the eyes for a smoky effectIngredientsMica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Boron Nitride, Silica, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Magnesium Myristate, Magnesium Palmitate, Magnesium Stearate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Isononyl Isononanoate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 40 Lake (CI 16035), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Manganese Violet (CI 77742).Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you received for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Apply a light shade all over eyelids, then swipe on a medium shade into creases and blend with your favorite e.l.f. Cosmetics eye brushesWork the darkest shade along lash lines on the outer corners of the eyes for a smoky effect

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love neutral colors and this one is perfect for a good price

reviews.headline: Love the colors!
reviews.comments: I bought this to try, because the one I used to use was discontinued. So I saw this pallet with the colors I like. I'm glad I picked this one, and plus it's inexpensive.

reviews.headline: This is amazing for the price, a staple for my makeup
reviews.comments: I wasn't prepared for this palette to be so good. The color payoff is really good, and it lasts all day. There is one shimmer, the second blue one, which isn't super visible as a shimmer. That's not the biggest deal, but color-wise, it's very similar to the one before it. It's definitely a price performer, though and a permanent part of my palette use/collection.

reviews.headline: I really like all the colors this are my favorite.
reviews.comments: I would buy this eye makeup again. Thank you.

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS PALETTE!!!
reviews.comments: This palette is so gorgeous and perfect for day and night time! I definitely think its a great drugstore dupe for the ethereal lights palette too if you love the color story!

reviews.headline: Love this palette
reviews.comments: Glad I found this. I was waiting for a higher-end brand to go in sale, which never did. I prefer the matte shadows, which all of these colors in this palette are. Please make more matte shadow palettes, ELF. The price cannot be beat.

reviews.headline: No pigment on eyelids!
reviews.comments: I tried everything to get the shadows to apply to my eye lids. I primed my eyes with glitter glue. I used my fingers to apply to my lids. I  tried brushes. ðŸ˜ª  Elf, I'd be willing to pay more for better eyeshadow products! This was my 3rd time buying and trying your eyeshadow pallets.  Returned again.

reviews.headline: Does not show up, don't buy
reviews.comments: Bought this for my togo makeup bag, it had all the perfect colors. But won't show up on my eyelids! It is like my kid's eyeshadow

reviews.headline: I tried to love these 10 pan eyeshadow palettes.
reviews.comments:
I tried everything I could think of to get the shadows on my eyes. Eyeshadow glue, and using my wet fingers to apply.  The shadows were chalky and patchy to apply 
 They disappeared within 30 minutes.  I'm  returning them for Milani pallets.

reviews.headline: wonderful!
reviews.comments: beautiful colors that are easily buildable and blend like a charm. i love it

reviews.headline: Love this pallete
reviews.comments: Great colors! They are fairly pigmented. I use an eyeshadow primer and they stay all day.

reviews.headline: Impressed
reviews.comments: I grabbed Nude Mood on a whim recently, and I'm really impressed with the quality actually. Not the quality for the price, but on its own! I wasn't ever really impressed with elf shadows before, but this is nice. It basically blends itself, the shades are lovely, and this palette in particular is something I can definitely use up completely. No dud shades or useless shades I'm going to ignore. I'm a big matte lover and this is going to be really great for early mornings before work if I want to look polished, but I also just love how easy and nice it looks for any time. I'm tempted to try more of the shade options now, but honestly I might get a backup of this one. The formula is really nice.

reviews.headline: Definitely buy this product again
reviews.comments: Excellent product, love the color palette and the price!

reviews.headline: It was mid
reviews.comments: Bought it to use for my homecoming makeup and it was super patchy and dry and not pigmented at all. Like i get being a powder but it was dry as freak bro. Also emphasizes wrinkles on ur eyes. The light pigments are super ashy. Black good for eyebrow

reviews.headline: I really like this eye shadow!
reviews.comments: Great product!

reviews.headline: Would purchase again!
reviews.comments: I like the coverage and the colors.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this. It goes on great. Definitely recommend

reviews.headline: Good for beginners
reviews.comments: I got the Need It Nude palette and it was alright. Really good if you like natural makeup or are a beginner. For me, the mattes seemed a bit chalky. The shimmers were pretty and subtle. The matte white and the pale gold shades were my favorite. I wish it was a bit more cool toned as well, it was a little orange. I also really like the clear packaging so you can see the colors when it is closed!

reviews.headline: Worth Trying Out
reviews.comments: I got "So Bright Now" and I'd say I'm mostly happy with it. I'm a cooler tone blues, greens, and purples type of person so I was mostly interested in that side of the pallette. The biggest dissapointment was the differences in color payoff, for example the purple color on my pallette is nearly invisible without putting in a lot of effort, whilet the blues show up just fine. It's a bit on the chalkier side but works for what I need it for, which is casual washes of color for everyday wear.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: Not very bright

media.headline: Picture shown is not what Ulta will send
media.caption: What you will get if you order one of these

media.headline: Pigmented and so pretty
media.caption: Intergalactic is so so pretty and worth it. The mattes are blendable and the shimmers are so pretty

faceoff_positive.comments: I got the everyday smokey pallette to uodate my age old eyeshadows. I must say I am hooked now on elfs shadow collections. The hard part was chiosing a pallette for everyday. I don't always do  extra smokey eyes these days, but I can pump it up with this one. I'm 63, so wearing a lot if glittery stuff on my eyes ages me. I love this pallette because it has a good offering of mattes and I can add a touch of beautiful shimmer where needed. It looks like the packaging has changed? Mine comes in a beautiful, premium feeling black case and I like that. I better scoop up some more at the drug store if this packaging is discontinued. I guess it's ok cause I like the bite size shadows so if they have to change the packaging to keep the price point down I'll have to accept that, darn it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Nice smokey pallette

faceoff_negative.comments: The mattes are smooth and gorgeous but the shimmers come off lacking not even bright enough to be a shadow topper.
faceoff_negative.headline: Meh
